sqlMap.select: select * from atch_file_detail where atch_file_id = #atchFileId# and file_sn = #fileSn#
sqlMap.insert:
select ATCH_FILE_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into atch_file (ATCH_FILE_ID, CREAT_DT, USE_AT) values ( #atchFileId#, sysdate, 'Y')

insert into atch_file_detail (ATCH_FILE_ID , FILE_SN , FILE_STRE_COURS , STRE_FILE_NM , ORIGNL_FILE_NM , FILE_EXTSN , FILE_CN , FILE_SIZE) values (#atchFileId# , (select nvl(max(file_sn), 0) + 1 from atch_file_detail where atch_file_id = #atchFileId#) , #fileStreCours# , #streFileNm# , #orignlFileNm# , #fileExtsn# , #fileCn# , #fileSize#)
